name: terra-toolkit
description: Utilities to help when developing terra modules

scripts.release:major: npm test && npm run compile && npm version major -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm run compile && npm version minor -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm run compile && npm version patch -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push
